FuncDef:
The radius-attribute vendor continuous command enables the device to carry multiple proprietary attributes in RADIUS attribute 26.
The undo radius-attribute vendor continuous command enables the device to carry only one proprietary attribute in RADIUS attribute 26.
By default, the device to carry multiple proprietary attributes in RADIUS attribute 26 is enabled.
CLIs: radius-attribute vendor { { huawei | microsoft | 3gpp2 | redback | dslforum | other } * | { all } } continuous
undo radius-attribute vendor { { huawei | microsoft | 3gpp2 | redback | dslforum | other } * | { all } } continuous

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the other proprietary attributes except the Huawei proprietary attribute, the Microsoft proprietary attribute, the 3GPP2 proprietary attribute, the RedBack proprietary attribute and the DSLForum proprietary attribute.
-

Enables RADIUS attribute 26 to carry multiple proprietary attributes.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To allow the device to connect to a non-Huawei RADIUS server that cannot parse consecutive proprietary attributes in packets, run the radius-attribute vendor continuous command to enable the device to carry multiple proprietary attributes in RADIUS attribute 26.
Configuration Impact
After the radius-attribute vendor continuous continuous command is used on the , RADIUS attribute 26 carries multiple proprietary attributes in a packet sent to the non-Huawei RADIUS server.
If the radius-attribute vendor continuous command is run more than once, the latest configuration does not override previous one.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
